name: df-mpl
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cmpl, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, csb(s2, co(cv(s0), cmps, cv(s1)), co(cv(s2), cress, crab(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s3), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, cv(s1))))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ mPoly =(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦[(s0[mPwSer]s1)/ s2](s2[|`s]{ s3 ∈(Base ` s2)| s3[finSupp](0 ` s1)}))
comment: Define the subalgebra of the power series algebra generated by the variables; this is the polynomial algebra (the set of power series with finite degree). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 25-Jun-2019.)
